title: Initial Design - 'EvoForge' Concept
summary: Raw idea → Structured design with core pillars. 2D tile-based world with magnetic snapping, critter AI, character creator, and pollution/shock system.
open_questions: How magnetic snapping scales to complex permutations

title: Snapping Permutations & Complexity
summary: Core mechanics → Infinite scalability & affinity system. 32-bit affinity masks, demand response system, chain depth mechanics, scaling with player behavior profiles.
key_decisions: 8 base affinities (heat, flow, bind, power, life, metal, void, wild)
open_questions: Balancing chain depth vs. pollution accumulation
Mobile UI for visualizing complex affinity overlaps

title: Mobile Platform Integration
summary: Web prototype → Native mobile experience. Capacitor/Ionic Vue pivot for mobile-first architecture with native plugins, haptics, and app store distribution.
key_decisions: Pinia over Zustand (later switched to Zustand)

title: Raycast Renderer Choice
summary: 2D tile-based → Raycasted 3D aesthetic. DOS-era inspired (Wolfenstein-style), smoothed and modernized. Efficient, seed-driven, feels vast without VRAM suck.
key_decisions: Phaser integration (embed raycast view in scene)
reasons_rejected: Performance unproven on mobile. Current implementation remains 2D tile-based. Deferred until performance validation.

title: Ecology and Reactivity
summary: Static world → Reactive ecosystem that mirrors player playstyle. Yuka behavior profiling (harmony/conquest/frolick) turns player vibes into world poetry.
key_decisions: Yuka behavior profiling (3 axes: harmony, conquest, frolick)
Hybrid magic (blended playstyles create unique outcomes)
open_questions: Balance tuning (how aggressive should reactions be?)

title: Materials to Alloys Crafting
summary: Basic snapping → Infinite scaling resource web. Player-driven growth loop, trait synergies, ecosystem feedback. Scales with player, not against.
open_questions: Mobile UI for complex affinity overlaps

title: Villages, Quests, and Emergence
summary: Static world → Emergent villages and quests from simulation rules. Procedural generation creates unique experiences, no hand-authored content.
key_decisions: Quest types scale with player progression
reasons_rejected: Pending combat and ritual systems. Full implementation deferred to Stage 2+.

title: World Hopping and Continuity
summary: Single world → Multiple worlds with 'stardust hops'. 80% single world immersion, 20% poetic exiles. Carry ONE scar echo across worlds.
key_decisions: Earned hops (not free, requires deep rituals)
Scar echo system (ONE scar per hop, mutates)
Kin calls (pull you back to previous worlds)
reasons_rejected: Pending ritual system. Full implementation deferred to Stage 2+.

title: Mobile Performance Constraints
summary: Web prototype → Mobile-optimized production targets. 60 FPS on mid-range Android, <150MB RAM, <3s load time, <10% battery per hour.
key_decisions: Chunk-based loading (load on demand, cache generated)

title: Vertical Slice Plan
summary: Full vision → Scoped MVP for initial release. 10-minute demo that hooks players, then expand based on feedback.
key_decisions: MVP first (vertical slice before full vision)
